title: Panel, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: chain stitch embroidery
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William Randolph Hearst, Jr.
description: Vertical panel with large black vertical central panel with symmetrical design of somewhat sparse floral cone rising from the stand. Embroidered in coarse orange wool chain stitch and outlined in white. Blue-green border with continuous scrolling floral border.

exhibitions.title: Lockwood de Forest, Frederic Church, and the Passion for the Exotic

tombstone.epitaph:
